title: Comply with Local Rental Regulations
description: A city passes a new ordinance requiring all rental properties to be registered. A property manager must comply for their entire portfolio.

tasks.description: Review the new city ordinance to understand the registration requirements and deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is fully aware of the new legal requirements.

tasks.description: Compile a list of all managed properties within that city.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete list of affected properties is generated.

tasks.description: Complete and submit the registration form and fee for each property before the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: All properties are successfully registered with the city.
